Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Specimen Type(s): Nasopharyngeal swab eluted in viral transport media
Nasal swab eluted in viral transport media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere i Influenza A & B, Strep A, RSV, and Influenza A & B 2 rapid, instrument-based, isothermal molecular assays with updated software algorithm.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, rapid, in vitro molecular detection of influenza A and B viral RNA (nasal/nasopharyngeal swabs), Group A Streptococcus DNA (throat swabs), and RSV viral RNA (nasopharyngeal swabs) to aid in differential diagnosis of respiratory infections, in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological factors.
